name: Fractured Magnitude - Test
description:
Play as a cube with immense power and a grave weakness. when you're hit, you shrink, shrink too much, you die

blast through swarms of enemies and collect gold to buy weapon upgrades and LF (lifeforce) to use those upgrades or to regen your health 

WASD-move

LMB-Shoot

1-4 switch weapons (or click icon)

This is an older build, which I "ported" to PC, while the game is still being developed for android. a lot of the issues found in this build have been fixed for the mobile version, but i wanted to  get a test build out, while I finish and polish up the android version

Soundtrack kindly provided by Eric Oberding
